definition: Allies/entente (i.e. Western powers allied to China in WW1)
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: As a result, they fought on the side of 11)the Allies.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他們站在協約國的一方作戰。

sentences.english: France and Russia, establish the entente group.
sentences.chinese: 法俄兩國，成立協約國集團。

sentences.english: There was a heated propaganda war between the Entente Countries and the Ally Countries during WWI.
sentences.chinese: 協約國和同盟國在一戰中展開了激烈的宣傳戰。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, 21 allied warships sat in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 其時，21艘協約國戰艦正在港口停泊。

sentences.english: The Treaty of Versailles, imposed on Germany, formalized the Allied victory.
sentences.chinese: 強加於德國的《凡爾塞條約》正式宣告協約國的勝利。
